Package org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.query.h2.opt

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GridH2SystemIndexFactory
    Factory for system table indexes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GridH2CollocationModel
    Collocation model for a query.
    GridH2Cursor
    H2 Cursor implementation.
    GridH2DefaultTableEngine
    Default table engine.
    GridH2IndexBase
    Index base.
    GridH2KeyRowOnheap
    Heap-based key-only row for remove operations.
    GridH2KeyValueRowOnheap
    Table row implementation based on GridQueryTypeDescriptor.
    GridH2MetaTable
    Meta table.
    GridH2PlainRowFactory
    Row factory.
    GridH2PrimaryScanIndex
    Wrapper type for primary key.
    GridH2ProxyIndex
    Allows to have 'free' index for alias columns Delegates the calls to underlying normal index
    GridH2ProxySpatialIndex
    Allows to have 'free' spatial index for alias columns Delegates the calls to underlying normal index
    GridH2QueryContext
    Thread local SQL query context which is intended to be accessible from everywhere.
    GridH2Row
    Row with locking support needed for unique key conflicts resolution.
    GridH2RowDescriptor
    Row descriptor.
    GridH2ScanIndex<D extends org.h2.index.BaseIndex>
    Scan index base class.
    GridH2SearchRowAdapter
    Dummy H2 search row adadpter.
    GridH2Table
    H2 Table implementation.
    GridH2ValueCacheObject
    H2 Value over CacheObject.
    GridLuceneDirectory
    A memory-resident Directory implementation.
    GridLuceneFile
    Lucene file.
    GridLuceneIndex
    Lucene fulltext index.
    GridLuceneInputStream
    A memory-resident IndexInput implementation.
    GridLuceneLockFactory
    Lucene LockFactory implementation.
    GridLuceneOutputStream
    A memory-resident IndexOutput implementation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DistributedJoinMode
    Defines set of distributed join modes.
    GridH2QueryType
    Query type.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    GridH2RetryException
    Internal exception.
